### Key Insights

**üö® Needs Attention:**

- **TechFlow SaaS** - Overspending budget by 13%, needs daily cap adjustment

**‚úÖ Performing Well:**
- **SportMax Apparel** - Strong conversion rate with 85% video completion
- **FinanceFirst Bank** - High viewability (85%), good desktop performance
- **GreenEnergy Co** - Efficient CPA, California region performing best

**üìä Just Launched:**
